ygData.subject: Re: Hell level?
ygData.msgSnippet: What are the stats on an Obsidian Shard, and where does one obtain it? Elwyn Level 22 Bard Erollosi Marr ... From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@hotmail.com]
ygData.messageBody:
What are the stats on an Obsidian Shard, and where does one obtain it?


Elwyn
Level 22 Bard
Erollosi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 4:34 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Hell level?


<clip

Up until now I was using a Dirk/Obsidian Shard combo in melee. I was the tin

rogue. Shard is a fun weapon to use btw (proc is useless on fire-based mobs
though), fast, decent dmg, and the effect is pretty cool.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 30th Chorus
Veeshan
